mapper.select: SELECT A.NO ,A.USER_NO ,A.CURRENT_NO ,A.ENROLLDATE ,A.CHECK_IN_TIME ,A.CHECK_OUT_TIME ,A.PLUS_WORK_TIME ,A.TOTAL_WORK_TIME ,A.OBJECTION_REASON ,A.APPROVAL_STATUS ,AC.TYPE ,U.NAME FROM ATTENDANCE A INNER JOIN "USER" U ON A.USER_NO = U.NO INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE_CURRENT AC ON A.CURRENT_NO = AC.NO WHERE U.NO = 1
